import React, { Component } from "react"; import './district.css'; export default class working extends Component { render() { return (
User Guide

Steps to follow for Customers

-----------------------------------------------------------

Step 1 : Create your own user account

Step 2 : Choose your district and the desired pharmacy store in our system to fullfill your medicinal requirements

Step 3 : Upload your valid prescription. Valid Prescription means a prescription that is legal under all applicable laws, issued to the person being tested by a licensed health care provider authorized to issue such prescription, used for its intended purpose, and used as prescribed

Step 4 : Place your order and wait until the response of the pharmacist

Step 5 : System will lead both parties to have a chatbox conversation and you can confirm your order and get the total amount of bill through the chatbox

Step 6 : Choose your payment option and settle your bill

Step 7 : After all this process pharmacy will deliver your medicines to your doorstep


Steps to follow for Pharmacies

-------------------------------------------------------------

Step 1 : Create your own pharmacy account

Step 2 : System will automatically add your parmacy in to the system and will display to the customers based on your respective district

Step 3 : You will get a notification when a customer place an order

Step 4 : Confirm your order by having a chatbox conversation with your customer and check the prescripton and prepare the order

Step 5 : Send the full billing details to your customer

Step 6 : After payment, Finally You can deliver the order to your customers doorstep

For more details visit our Facebook, Instagram and Youtube or contcat us via Google or Contcat numbers

); } }
